title: Market Turmoil, Coronavirus and 2020
itunes:title: Market Turmoil, Coronavirus and 2020
description:
Kevin spoke to Jurrien Timmer, Director of Global Macro at Fidelity Investments about the stock market which had the worst day since the financial crisis.


Panel guests: Mark Paustenbach, Democratic Strategist, Senior Vice President @ Rokk Solutions and Scott Tranter, CEO of 0ptimus and former Data Science Director for Marco Rubio for President.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
